CollaborationRoom.name: CollaborationRoom
CollaborationRoom.description: Represents a collaboration room, which links Salesforce to a Slack channel used by applications with specific use cases, such as swarming or reporting.

IsArchived.description: Indicates whether the collaboration room is archived (true) or not (false).

IsAutoJoin.description: Indicates whether new users automatically join the collaboration room. Used for Sales Cloud for Slack App.

IsExternal.description: Indicates whether external users are members of the Slack channel (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: Timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: Timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate) but not viewed it.
